特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
In principle, this class will be face-to-face; however, all class materials, tasks, and explanations will be posted in a Google Classroom dedicated to this class. If you need to contact me, please do so at andrew.kgu@gmail.com

Depending on enrollment and the evolving COVID-19 situation, course format may include the following:
- Individual, pair and group discussion based on topics that relate to content
- Sharing of information, including weekly homework assignments, on Google Classroom
- Presentation and homework assignments
- All components of the course conducted in English
- Being a level 2 class, students will be expected to perform English tasks at an upper-intermediate level

第1回:
*All contents below subject to change, depending on needs and interests of the enrolled students.

Week 1: class overview, introductions, ice breakers

In principle, all 14 sessions will be conducted face to face
Needs Analysis Survey: 1 hour
第2回: Week 2: The Coronavirus pandemic and its impact on the economy in Japan and around the world, discussion of first 250-word journal (economics topic #1)

a 250-word weekly journal will be assigned involving the discussion contents of the following class.
Journal 1: 1-2 hours
第3回: Week 3: Womenomics - the role of working women in the Japanese economy, discussion of second 250-word journal (economics topic #2)
第4回: Week 4: Defining the sharing economy and its role in Japan and beyond, discussion of third 250-word journal (economics topic #3)
第5回: Week 5: Discussing and comparing Japanese and Canadian companies, discussion of fourth 250-word journal (business topic #1)
第6回: Week 6: introducing the OECD's better-life index and Japan's ranking, introduction of final presentation, discussion of fifth 250-word journal (hybrid topic #2)
第7回: Week 7: Advertising in Japan and the around the world, discussion of sixth 250-word journal (business topic #2)
第8回: Week 8: Importing, exporting, and the role of the OECD better-life index; discussion of seventh 250-word journal (business topic #3)
第9回: Week 9: Liberalism vs. Conservatism in North America, discussion of eighth 250-word journal (politics topic #1)
第10回: Week 10: same-sex marriage or other social political issue, discussion of ninth 250-word journal (politics topic #2)
第11回: Week 11: age of adulthood or other social political issue, discussion of final 250-word journal (politics topic #3)
